attributes.action: Make Coeliac Disease a recognised Disability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to start a petition to make Coeliac disease a recognised disability as i feel it is unfair for Coeliac sufferers to have to pay out more money for their food just because they suffer from the condition, i would also like to see better and cheaper food on prescription other than the bog standard loaf of bread and pasta thats on offer at present.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make Coeliac Disease a recognised Disability."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16822


Prime Minister's Office
